title: Who Falls Hardest
description: "What happened between the four of usâ€”it changes everything."Everything in my life has been turned on its head. My allies have become enemies, and my enemies have become...I don't even know what.There's no denying the pull between me and each of the Icons anymore. I've denied it long enough, and I'm done letting secrets fester between us.I know they want me too. But how am I supposed to choose between them?Why do I have to?This is the final book in the Clearwater University series, a new adult reverse harem bully romance. Due to language and intense sexual situations, it is recommended for readers 18+.
author: Eva Ashwood
